caption.p: Histopathological analysis on brain, spleen and liver tissues of TG and WT mice infected with PRV. Tissues were fixed in 4% formaldehyde and subsequently embedded paraffin for sectioning and HE staining. Black arrows indicate histopathological damages. a, c and e showed HE stained brain, spleen and liver tissues of represented WT mice; b, d, f showed HE stained brain, spleen and liver tissues of represented TG mice
